name: A Musical Disasterpiece
description:
Dodge the obstacles and enjoy the  chaos

Controls :

  • Left CTRL to crouch
  • SPACE to jump

Unfortunately due to a lightning strike my computer got fried :( and I have lost all my files, thankfully I uploaded this test so at least I can still submit something. anyway I hope you enjoy this very unfinished package of chaos

Made in 2 days for Brackyes game jam 2021.2
